meanings.definition: A type of helmet worn in medieval times.
meanings.sent1: The knight put on his sallet before heading into battle.
meanings.sent2: The sallet protected the soldier's head during the jousting tournament.
meanings.sent3: The shiny sallet made the knight look like a brave warrior.
meanings.sent4: The sallet was like a metal guardian for the knight's head.
meanings.sent5: The clinking sound of the sallet echoed through the castle walls.

meanings.definition: A type of salad made with raw vegetables.
meanings.sent1: Mom prepared a delicious sallet for dinner with fresh lettuce and tomatoes.
meanings.sent2: The colorful sallet was a hit at the potluck party.
meanings.sent3: The rabbit wished it could have a taste of the crunchy sallet.
meanings.sent4: The vibrant colors of the sallet resembled a beautiful garden on a plate.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the zesty dressing on the sallet filled the kitchen.
